title.narrative: Livestock: Rural Microfinance and Livestock Support Programme

description.narrative: The goal of the programme is to reduce the vulnerability and improve the livelihood means, incomes, food security and nutritional status of poor and vulnerable rural households on a sustainable basis in selected areas of Afghanistan. The programme purpose is to provide sustainable access to smallholders, existing livestock owners and those who aspire to have livestock ' with a focus on women, woman-headed households, the uncreditworthy and the Kuchis ' to appropriate microfinance services and technical livestock packages (health, management, processing and marketing) and the skills required to engage in new, more productive or more profitable economic, livestock-based enterprises.

name.narrative: Livestock: Rural Microfinance and Livestock Support Programme

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
